Rank.Description: Increases damage and healing done by 1%.

Rank.Description: Increases all of your ally's attributes by 1% if your ally is affected by Motif of Bravery, Motif of Regeneration and Motif of Tenacity. Lasts 20 seconds.

Ability.Description: Causes Combo Points to persist when using Codas. Lasts 15s.

Rank.Description: Your Cadence heals up to 5 party and raid members for 2% of your Attack Power each time it deals damage.
Your Cadence heals up to 5 party and raid members for 4% of your Attack Power each time it deals damage.
Your Cadence heals up to 5 party and raid members for 6% of your Attack Power each time it deals damage.
Your Power Chord heals up to 5 party and raid members for 3% of your Attack Power. Increases the damage of your next Cadence or Cadenza by 5%.
Your Power Chord heals up to 5 party and raid members for 6% of your Attack Power. Increases the damage of your next Cadence or Cadenza by 10%.
Your Power Chord heals up to 5 party and raid members for 9% of your Attack Power. Increases the damage of your next Cadence or Cadenza by 15%.
Your Motif of Regeneration now affects party and raid members.
Increases the damage of Bard attacks by 10%.
Increases the damage of Bard attacks by 20%.
Increases the damage of Bard attacks by 30%.
Using a Coda has a 20% chance per Combo Point spent, to apply a stacking buff to you, increasing your Attack Power by 8% per stack. Maximum 1 stack.

Using a Coda has a 20% chance per Combo Point spent, to apply a stacking buff to you, increasing your Attack Power by 8% per stack. Maximum 5 stacks.

Ability.Description: Each time a Coda is used, the Rogue has a 20% chance per Combo Point to gain Harmonic Energy, increasing damage by 5%. This buff stacks up to 5 times. Harmonic Distortion consumes 1 stack of Harmonic Energy and heals a single ally for 568 to 628 health.

Rank.Description: Cadenza reduces the cooldown of Verse of Agony and Verse of Vitality by 1 second per second of channel.
Cadenza reduces the cooldown of Verse of Agony and Verse of Vitality by 2 seconds per second of channel.
